Soft Studio Light: harsh shadows, direct sunlight, amateur lighting, grainy, volumetric dust
High-Key Lighting: dark, moody, shadowy, low-key, black background, cinematic moonlight
Low-Key / Dramatic: bright, flat lighting, high-key, sun-drenched, soft studio light
Rembrandt Lighting: flat lighting, no shadows, overhead light, high-key
Golden Hour: cool tones, blue hour, mid-day sun, harsh shadows, cinematic moonlight, cold & frosty
Cinematic Moonlight: warm lighting, sunlight, bright colors, day-time, golden hour, firelight
God Rays: flat lighting, indoor lighting, no atmosphere, shadowless
Bioluminescent Glow: daylight, natural sun, bright environment, sun-drenched
Volumetric Dust: clean air, sterile, vacuum, sharp shadows, clinical, soft studio light
Anamorphic Lens Flare: round lens flare, natural light, no flare, soft lighting, vintage
Bioluminescent Spores: daylight, sun-drenched, clinical, sharp shadows, non-glowing
Hard Rim Light: flat lighting, no backlight, soft edges, shadowless
Cyberpunk Neon: natural lighting, sunlight, monochrome, dull colors, earthy tones, vintage sepia
Raytraced Global Illumination: flat shading, 2d, low quality, bad shadows, lowres
